tweet: Just finished my 2nd Cd, "Holding on to Love" and getting ready for upcoming shows!! Planning on performing in L.A. as much as possible!
Getting ready to spend my day at the little league fields :)
Is excitied to go to Billy Joel/Elton John concert this week with Billy Trudel who used to tour with them so it will be a lot of fun!
Hi I'm running around sending out cds today!! New listeners in Australia- yeah :)
I'm getting ready to answer emails! Wish Starbucks was open this late :)
